summary: Survey360 Frontend Testing Complete - All 4 features verified. Landing page displays Survey360 branding correctly, Login page shows demo credentials (demo@survey360.io / Test123!), Survey Builder page displays all 10 question types, Navigation between pages works correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: LandingPage.jsx: Well-structured with proper Survey360 branding, features grid, stats section, and CTA
LoginPage.jsx: Demo credentials clearly displayed with data-testid attributes for email, password, and submit button
SurveyBuilderPage.jsx: All 10 question types defined in QUESTION_TYPES constant and rendered correctly
DashboardLayout.jsx: Clean sidebar navigation with proper routing for Home, Surveys, Responses, Settings
Protected routes working correctly - unauthenticated users redirected to login
Auth state persisted via zustand with localStorage (survey360-auth)
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - frontend uses mock data fallbacks
context_for_next_testing_agent: Survey360 is a standalone Vite frontend app at /app/survey360/frontend. Start with 'cd /app/survey360/frontend && yarn dev --port 5173'. Backend APIs are MOCKED - frontend has mock data fallbacks. Auth state stored in localStorage key 'survey360-auth'. All pages tested: Landing (/), Login (/login), Dashboard (/dashboard), Surveys (/surveys), Survey Builder (/surveys/new, /surveys/:id/edit).

landing_page_branding.cta_buttons: PASS - Sign In, Get Started, Start Free Trial visible

login_page.branding: PASS - Survey360 logo and branding on left panel

survey_builder_page.header_actions: PASS - Preview, Settings, Save buttons visible
survey_builder_page.mock_data: PASS - Customer Satisfaction Survey loads in edit mode

navigation.protected_routes: PASS - Redirect to login when unauthenticated
navigation.sidebar_navigation: PASS - Home, Surveys, Responses, Settings links work

mocked_apis_list: All Survey360 backend APIs - frontend has mock data fallbacks in SurveyBuilderPage.jsx loadSurvey()
